document.full_text: south african charl schwartzel made a spectacular start to sunday's final round at the masters, a sizzling birdie-par-eagle run putting him into a tie for the lead with britain's rory mcilroy.
document.title: sizzling schwartzel ties mcilroy in lead
lines_and_colors: south african charl schwartzel made a spectacular start to sunday's final round at the masters, a sizzling birdie-par-eagle run putting him into a tie for the lead with britain's rory mcilroy.
